_header: The bliss of our heart all it is ago
_description: The Sinners’ Lament — two couplets based on Lam. 5:15-16

BLHar7322.Transcription: Þe blisse of oure herte al it is agoAl ure wele torned is to woÞe croune of vre heued ffallen is to groundeÞat we euer syngeden weylawey þe stounde
BLHar7322.Note: Written to right of Latin prose text as if a second column, below 5043; treated as part of 5043 in Furnivall’s edition.
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
